app.word

Interface WordRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Word,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Word,java.lang.Long>

    public interface WordRepository
extends org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Word,java.lang.Long>
    Author:
    olaholik interface representing Word table in database. created repository sets types of interesting object Word and type of its ID: Long. prepared customized functions to get more specified data.
